title: Atlanta struggles with a crippling cyber hack
text:
Atlanta struggles with a crippling cyber hack 3:44pm BST - 01:24 
Atlanta is still struggling with its ability to collect online payments of bills and fees, days after a ransomware attack snarled the computer system of Georgia’s capital city. Havovi Cooper reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Atlanta is still struggling with its ability to collect online payments of bills and fees, days after a ransomware attack snarled the computer system of Georgia’s capital city. Havovi Cooper reports.
